Class ObjectChecks

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class ObjectChecks
extends Object
    Helper class for checking objects (null checks, equality checks, ...)
    Author:
    Arne Welzel, Marcel Reichenbach

    • Method Detail

      • checkForNullReference

        public static void checkForNullReference(Object object,
                                         String message)
        Copied from project: irond (https://github.com/trustathsh/irond.git Package: src.de.fhhannover.inform.iron.mapserver.utils If the given object is null, a NullPointerException is thrown with a given message.
        Parameters:
        object - the Object that is checked for being a null reference
        message - a String that is given to the NullPointerException

      • equalsWithNullReferenceAllowed

        public static boolean equalsWithNullReferenceAllowed(Object one,
                                                     Object other)
        Checks equality of two Objects. If both are null, true is returned. Otherwise, one.equals(other) or other.equals(one) are called, using the not null-value as the first operator.
        Parameters:
        one - a Object
        other - another Object
        Returns:
        true, if both Object are equal or both are null
